block.p: APPLEBAUM-Molly. Age 90, died September 16, 2000. Wife of the late Jacob Applebaum, of Kew Gardens Hills, partner of the late William Goldman, of Tamarac, FL. Mother of James, Jane Barry and Amy Hutchings. Grandmother of David, Mimi, Julia, Jacob, Kenneth, Spencer and Peter, and great-grandmother of Lena, Lucy & Adam. Survived also by a sister Sarah Lieber. Memorial service at a later date. ''If music be the food of life play on''.
